column1: Source: USDA Branded Food Products Database Release July 2018 Software v.3.9.5 2018-08-15
Nutrient data for: CADBURY MARVELLOUS CREATIONS CHOCOLATE JELLY POPPING CANDY, UNPREPARED, GTIN: 07622210464507
Food Group:  Branded Food Products Database

Ingredients: MILK**, sugar, cocoa butter, glucose syrup, cocoa mass, vegetable fats (palm, shea), maize starch, emulsifiers (E442, E476, SOYA lecithin, sunflower lecithin), dried whey (from MILK), fat-reduced cocoa, lactose (from MILK), dried whole MILK, glazing agents (gum arabic, beeswax, shellac, carnauba wax), colours (anthocyanins, E101, carotenes, beetroot red, E171, E172), citric acid, flavourings. **The equivalent of 426ml of fresh liquid milk in every 227g of milk chocolate.MILK CHOCOLATE: MILK SOLIDS 20% MINIMUM, ACTUAL 23%.COCOA SOLIDS 20% MINIMUM.CONTAINS VEGETABLE FATS IN ADDITION TO COCOA BUTTER. MAY CONTAIN NUTS, WHEAT. Date available: 11/10/2017 Date last updated by company: 11/02/2017
